categories.title: BBQs, Grills
categories.desc: We stock an extensive selection of gas grills, pellet grills, grill accessories, BBQ tools, BBQ sauces, BBQ rubs, and charcoal.

categories.title: Fire Pits, Fire Tables
categories.desc: There are few things better than a nice summer evening with friends and family around a fire pit or table.

categories.title: Heaters
categories.desc: Outdoor heaters are designed to breathe new life into your outdoor patio. We offer infrared electric heaters for use both indoor and outdoor, as well as high efficiency gas units.
